titles.title: Agriculture Resilience Act of 2025
Agriculture Resilience Act of 2025
To address the impact of climate change on agriculture, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Workforce, Energy and Commerce, House Administration, and Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
